statements: SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT first_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE address IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, email, address FROM customers WHERE last_name = 'Smith';
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE address IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT email FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE first_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customers ORDER BY first_name DESC, last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY last_name DESC, first_name ASC
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date ASC
SELECT orders.order_id, orders.total_amount, customers.first_name, customers.last_name FROM orders INNER JOIN customers ON orders.customer_id = customers.customer_id
SELECT DISTINCT first_name, last_name FROM customers
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, email FROM customers WHERE first_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT order_id, product_id, quantity, total_price FROM order_items WHERE total_price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY order_id DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000.00;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM order_items WHERE quantity > 5 ORDER BY total_price DESC;

SELECT customers.first_name, orders.order_date, order_items.quantity, order_items.price_per_unit FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id JOIN order_items ON orders.order_id = order_items.order_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price, stock_quantity FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT o.order_id, o.order_date, c.first_name, c.last_name FROM orders o JOIN customers c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE total_amount > 100;
SELECT oi.order_item_id, p.product_name, oi.quantity, oi.subtotal FROM order_items oi JOIN products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id WHERE oi.order_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(order_id) AS num_orders FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING num_orders > 2;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 10.00 AND 50.00 ORDER BY price DESC;

SELECT orders.order_id, products.product_name, order_items.quantity, order_items.subtotal FROM orders INNER JOIN order_items ON orders.order_id = order_items.order_id INNER JOIN products ON order_items.product_id = products.product_id WHERE orders.customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT customer_name, review_text FROM customers JOIN reviews ON customers.customer_id = reviews.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE address IS NOT NULL AND phone_number IS NOT NULL;

SELECT products.product_name, products.price, order_items.quantity, orders.total_amount FROM products INNER JOIN order_items ON products.product_id = order_items.product_id INNER JOIN orders ON order_items.order_id = orders.order_id WHERE orders.status = 'Pending';

SELECT customers.customer_name, orders.order_date, products.product_name, reviews.rating FROM customers INNER JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id INNER JOIN order_items ON orders.order_id = order_items.order_id INNER JOIN products ON order_items.product_id = products.product_id INNER JOIN reviews ON products.product_id = reviews.product_id WHERE reviews.rating > 3;

SELECT orders.order_id, customers.customer_name, orders.total_amount, order_items.quantity, products.product_name, reviews.review_text FROM orders INNER JOIN customers ON orders.customer_id = customers.customer_id INNER JOIN order_items ON orders.order_id = order_items.order_id INNER JOIN products ON order_items.product_id = products.product_id LEFT JOIN reviews ON products.product_id = reviews.product_id ORDER BY orders.order_date DESC LIMIT 10;
